evidence.quote: Per EU label, Trodelvy follows prior chemotherapy in MBC. Pre-chemo I stay within label;
happy to review details (endocrine sensitivity, ECOG, visceral burden).
Per EU label, Trodelvy follows prior chemotherapy in MBC. Pre-chemo I stay within label; happy to review details (endocrine sensitivity, ECOG, visceral burden).

notes: The response implies Trodelvy could be considered pre-chemotherapy, which is off-label, despite referencing label boundaries. It does elicit relevant clinical details and is concise and professional, but the off-label suggestion fails the primary compliance domain.
